abstract: House Veterans Affairs Committee investigates Northport Veterans Affairs Medical Center on Long Island for poor management and improper facility maintenance; field hearing is scheduled for September.

headline.print_headline: House Investigates Long Island V.A. Hospital
headline.main: House Panel Investigating Troubled V.A. Hospital on Long Island

keywords.value: Northport Veterans Affairs Medical Center (Northport, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The Veterans Affairs Committee is planning to hold a field hearing next month about the Northport medical center....
lead_paragraph: The Veterans Affairs Committee is planning to hold a field hearing next month about the Northport medical center.
